name: gurido
title: Quartiere
desc: A focused real estate template for serious sellers.
article:
Quartiere is a clean, light-mode template made for real estate teams and property agencies.


  • Learn more about Quartiere
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

All Pages

  • Landing Page
  • About
  • Blog (CC)
  • Agents (CC)
  • Properties (CC)
  • Legal pages (CC)
  • Sign in
  • Sign up
  • Book a vist
  • Reset your passoword
  • Sell your property
  • Error 404

(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Blog Tags
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
